scripts.prod:deploy: tar --exclude='node_modules/' --exclude='.git/' -czf - . | ssh node@scu-server 'cd ~; DEST_DIR=~/scu_web; rm -rf $DEST_DIR; mkdir -p $DEST_DIR; tar xzf - -C $DEST_DIR; cd $DEST_DIR && yarn install -s'
scripts.remote-prod:start: ssh node@scu-server 'cd ~/scu_web; pm2 stop scu-web; yarn prod:build; pm2 restart --update-env ~/.scu-server/scu-web-ecosystem.config.js'
